name: PublishPackageToPowerShellGallery
friendlyName: PowerShell Gallery Packager for Azure DevOps
description: Azure DevOps plugin for publishing PowerShell module to PowerShell Gallery
author: Richie Lee

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Key to publish module. You can obtain the key from https://www.powershellgallery.com/account

inputs.name: path
inputs.label: Module Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: PowerShell module folder. Folder name should match with psm1 and psd1 files.

inputs.name: setVersionNumberInManifest
inputs.label: Update version in psd1 file?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to update the module manifest version before publishing to PowerShell Gallery. Both psd1 FIle Path and New ModuleVersion must be filled in for this to work.

inputs.name: psd1FileName
inputs.label: psd1 File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path and filename of the psd1 file that needs the version number updating.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: New ModuleVersion Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Update the ModuleVersion Number element to this value in the psd1 file.
